translation.en: What the…?
Who are you?
-You shouldn’t be able to see me. -Of course I can see you.
translation.ja: 見えないはず 見える

translation.en: But I’m invisible to humans.
You’re right in front of me. What are you doing in my room?
translation.ja: 目の前に立ってるなぜ私の部屋に？

translation.en: -Uh, I… -Well?
translation.ja: えっと 私… 何よ

translation.en: …brought you home from the park.
That’s right.
There was this book hanging in midair.
translation.ja: 本が浮かんでて変だったんだよね

translation.en: It was so weird. Did you see it?
translation.ja: 本が浮かんでて変だったんだよね 見た？

translation.en: Yes.
Huh. I touched it, and then zap!
Oh, lucky you found me. I could still be lying there.
translation.ja: 運んでもらってよかった

translation.en: Yes. [chuckles] Lucky.
translation.ja: まあ そう言えるか

translation.en: Thanks.
How did you get in here?
Your window was open.
Who are you?
I should go.
Listen. My dad’s a cop,
so, you better tell me what you’re doing in my room before I have you arrested.
translation.ja: 逮捕させる前に答えて

translation.en: That’s it, Kyra. Keep moving. Woo! Come on!
translation.ja: ８時間前よし カイラ ８時間前 ８時間前いけ

translation.en: [Peter] Yes! Woo!
Go Kyra. Woo!
-I thought we had 'em this time. -You couldn’t have played any harder.
translation.ja: 〝リバーシティ高校〞 〝リバーシティ高校〞惜しかった 惜しかった 頑張ったよ

translation.en: That's just it. We have to, if we’re going to beat them.
Bad luck, Kyra. That’s four losses in a row.
It was only one point.
[Peter] Denial. That's a sure sign nothing’s wrong.
Peter, do you have any idea how annoying you are?
translation.ja: ピーターウザいと分かってる？

translation.en: Absolutely. It’s a skill honed through years of practice.
translation.ja: ああ 練習して身につけた

translation.en: Go practice on someone else, then.
Happy reading.
Ah! Ladder. I’ve got a list for you.
translation.ja: やあ はしご　本を頼む

translation.en: I’ll be needing Boyle’s Bestiary and the third volume of the Encyclopedia of Incantations and Spells,
translation.ja: 「ボイルの動物寓話(ぐうわ)集」「呪文百科事典 第３巻」

translation.en: Oh and The Little Book of Teacher’s Jokes.
translation.ja: そうだ「教師のジョーク集」

translation.en: Well, I have to keep the class amused.
"Foundation Magic Level 1. Foundation Magic Level 2.
Compendium of Toadstools."
Ah. "The Theory and Practice of Conjuring".
-Professor Maxwell! -Imogen.
You’re either early for your next class, or late for the one you missed last month.
translation.ja: 早く来た？それとも先月の授業の遅刻？

translation.en: I thought I’d come in early and um…
-Yes? -…tidy up.
translation.ja: 何だ 掃除をしようかと忙しいんでしょ

translation.en: I know how busy you must be, with the bookshop and all.
translation.ja: 掃除をしようかと忙しいんでしょ

translation.en: That’s very considerate of you.
Happy to help.
Good! The shelves haven’t been cleaned in over a decade.
translation.ja: 棚の掃除は10年以上やってない

translation.en: Well, you could get a few rows done before class.
As I see it, your defensive game is strong but, your offense needs work.
translation.ja: 防御はいいけど攻撃を強化しないとね

translation.en: Aw! Is that your opinion, is it?
Don’t get snippy, Mathilda. I’m offering constructive criticism.
translation.ja: よせよ　建設的な批判だ

translation.en: You expect us to take criticism from a guy who believes in UFOs?
Not UFOs. Visitors from the Multiverse.
translation.ja: 多元宇宙からの客だよ

translation.en: Given that there are an infinite number of universes surrounding us, it’s inevitable that we will have visitors.
translation.ja: 宇宙が無数にある以上絶対 誰か来るはずだ

translation.en: Whatever. Maybe you could give them sports advice.
translation.ja: そいつらに意見してあげな

translation.en: -Hey, what’s your dress size, Peter? -Huh?
We’ll get you a uniform and you can join the team. Then you’d realize how irritating your criticism is.
translation.ja: チームに入れば批判のウザさが分かるよ

translation.en: I think a dress would work on me. I’ve got good legs.
translation.ja: ユニホームは似合いそう

translation.en: -All yours. I’m just leaving. -Thanks.
translation.ja: どうぞ　行くよ どうも

translation.en: Didn’t see you at dinner. Big night?
Goblin party, sis. Those dudes sure love to dance.
translation.ja: ゴブリンはダンス好きでね

translation.en: Last time I looked, Darra, this was a library, not a café.
translation.ja: ダラ カフェじゃないぞ

translation.en: Sorry, Professor.
Has anyone seen Lily?
We had a tooth run last night. Maybe she slept in.
Transforming teeth into coins must really take it out of you fairies.
translation.ja: 歯をコインに変えるのが大仕事か

translation.en: Actually, it’s a complex transference process only our species can perform.
translation.ja: 複雑な作業で妖精にしかできないのよ

translation.en: Oh, the fairy’s feisty.
Can we please get started?
Sorry I’m late, Professor Maxwell.
Don’t worry, Lily-pily. Everyone knows fairies aren’t built for speed.
translation.ja: 妖精が速くないのは知れ渡ってる

translation.en: That’s a commonly held misconception.
Fairies, in fact, broke the trans-Atlantic record in the last two flying marathons.
translation.ja: 大西洋マラソンで２回 記録を立ててる

translation.en: Like that matters.
Next Wednesday’s test… I’ve made it today instead.
translation.ja: 水曜のテストを今日 やることにする

translation.en: What? Seriously?
You mean, you haven’t all prepared for it by now?
Just kidding. It is next Wednesday.
-I’m ready, Professor. -No surprises there.
translation.ja: 今日でも 変更はない

translation.en: -I need a bit more time. -Me too.
Could you give us any hints about the test?
I find reading the textbook helps.
The Theory and Practice of Conjuring. Row ten, shelf five.
translation.ja: 「召喚の理論と実践」10列５番の棚だ

translation.en: As well as that?
Cute ducky!
-Does that mean the test is about ducks? -No, Darra. The hint is…
translation.ja: これが出る？ 違う　ヒントは…

translation.en: …be prepared.
♪ Wouldn’t it be so good to be? ♪
♪ Wouldn’t it feel so right? ♪
♪ Couldn’t you be the one for me? ♪
♪ Holding me tight ♪
♪ I’ve been thinking about yesterday ♪
translation.ja: 昨日のことを考えてた

translation.en: ♪ I’ve been thinking ’bout games to play ♪
♪ I don’t know it it’s right I don’t know if it’s wrong ♪
translation.ja: 正しいか間違いか分からない

translation.en: ♪ Wouldn’t it be so good to be? ♪
♪ Wouldn’t it feel so right? ♪
-Couldn’t you be the one for me… -[smoke alarm bleeps]
Dad!
Dad, you’ve burned it again!
translation.ja: パパ また焦げてるよ

translation.en: Sorry, love. Late for my night shift.
translation.ja: 悪い　夜勤に遅れる

translation.en: -That coffee’s from yesterday. -Urgh!
Actually… I think that’s from last week. There’s pizza for dinner…
translation.ja: 先週のだと思う夕食のピザは…

translation.en: In the freezer. Yeah. I’m on it. I’ll put it in the oven after my run.
translation.ja: 冷凍庫ね　走ってから食べる

translation.en: I don't like you running after dark.
I’ll be fine. I won’t be back late.
Well, be careful.
Bye.
Hello?
Hello?
Who’s there?
Hello?
Imogen? You can’t take a book out of the library!
translation.ja: イモジェン？持ち出し禁止よ

translation.en: What the…?
You okay?
What? Why?
It looks like you didn’t even bother getting undressed.
Guess I was so tired I fell asleep.
translation.ja: 疲れて寝落ちしたみたい

translation.en: You better watch that. Can’t have you falling asleep in the middle of a game.
translation.ja: 試合中に寝落ちしたら大変だぞ

translation.en: So funny, Dad… not.
I’ll see you after work?
Are you going in again?
Not me. You. Saturday, remember. Dog walking?
translation.ja: お前 土曜は犬の散歩だろ

translation.en: Oh, my God!
Take it easy, fellas. You’re stretching my arms.
translation.ja: 落ち着いて　腕が伸びちゃう

translation.en: -Who is she kidding? -What?
translation.ja: 自分を犬だと思ってるバカだね

translation.en: Is that you?
Uh-oh. I think she can hear me.
I can hear you!
Um, sorry about the joke.
Why can I hear what you’re thinking?
I don’t know. Have you change your diet recently?
translation.ja: 食生活を変えたせいとか

translation.en: -[Peter] Kyra? -[whimpers]
What are you doing?
You’re not going to believe this. I can hear Doris talking!
translation.ja: なんと ドリスが話してる

translation.en: Who’s Doris?
Well, this dog. Doris… do it again.
translation.ja: 犬よ ドリス もう１度

translation.en: -Come on, Doris! Say something! -[barks]
Are you making fun of me?
-What? No, I’m serious. -So I believe in the Multiverse,
translation.ja: いや 私は本気だけど 多元宇宙信者でもからかうな

translation.en: That's no reason to play some lame joke on me.
translation.ja: 多元宇宙信者でもからかうな

translation.en: [Doris] He’s cute. Is he your boyfriend?
What? No! There, she did it again!
translation.ja: まさか　違うよ 聞いたでしょ

translation.en: This isn’t funny.
You got any dog treats? I’m hungry.
translation.ja: おやつはある？　腹ペコよ

translation.en: No one is supposed to take books from the library.
I needed it to study for the test.
You were going to keep it so none of us could study and you would get top marks.
translation.ja: トップを狙って教科書を独占？

translation.en: I was being resourceful.
Well, your resourcefulness has landed us in a lot of trouble. The girl saw me.
translation.ja: そのせいであの子に見られたわ

translation.en: [sighs] Impossible. No human can see us unless we let them.
translation.ja: あんたが見せたせいでしょ

translation.en: I didn’t let her see me on purpose. We did something to her.
translation.ja: 見せてない何か起きたのよ

translation.en: Not my problem.
Hey, Maxwell.
You here?
Maxwell?
How do you do that? It freaks me out.
I was a ghost in another life. Mm.
Not so fast. Did it come in?
translation.ja: まだだね　入荷した？

translation.en: Cool. Return of the Time Nemesis. First edition. How did you find it?
translation.ja: 「タイムネメシスの再来」よく見つけたね

translation.en: A magician never reveals his secrets. And now my reward…
translation.ja: 魔術師はタネを明かさないもらうぞ

translation.en: This all happened because you took that book.
No, it happened because you came after me.
Don’t you realize how serious this is?
Oh! Just like a fairy to get worked up over nothing.
You can’t leave her like this. If she can see us, who knows what she can do?
translation.ja: 放っとけないわ他にも能力があるかも

translation.en: Like I said not my problem!
You’re not going anywhere until you fix it!
Whoa! What was that?
Uh, old shop. Bad wiring. I better close up.
translation.ja: 配線が古いんだ 閉店して電気工を呼ぶ

translation.en: Call an electrician.
translation.ja: 閉店して電気工を呼ぶ

translation.en: [clears throat] Thank you, Peter. Goodbye.
Enjoy the croissant.
What’s going on? I had a customer in there!
translation.ja: 何してる　客がいたんだぞ

translation.en: -Ah… -Well?
We were conducting an experiment.
-A conjuring spell. -Yes, a conjuring spell for the test.
translation.ja: 召喚の呪文 テストのためにね

translation.en: And…
We failed to conjure anything.
translation.ja: 何も呼び出せなかった

translation.en: That’s it. Sorry.
[Lily] Yeah. Sorry.
We promise not to do it again.
-Right, Imogen? -Absolutely.
Well, it’s a change to see fairies and elves working together. I’ll leave you both to savor this rare moment.
translation.ja: 妖精とエルフが協力とはね仲よくやることだ

translation.en: We still have a problem, no matter whose fault it is.
translation.ja: 誰のせいでも問題は消えない

translation.en: An elf doesn’t clean up a fairy’s mess. You deal with it!
translation.ja: 妖精の尻拭いは お断り

translation.en: I suppose I could, or I could tell the professor about the book.
translation.ja: 本の持ち出しを教授に言いつけるよ

translation.en: He doesn’t look too kindly on cheating. Who can blame him?
translation.ja: 教授はズルに厳しいからね

translation.en: Fairies can erase memories, right?
Do you know how risky that is? If I tried and it went wrong, I would be in serious trouble.
translation.ja: すごく危険よ失敗したら大惨事になる

translation.en: You’re already in serious trouble. Can you do it or not?
translation.ja: もう大惨事だよ　消せるの？

translation.en: -[Mathilda] Hey, Kyra. -Hi, Matty. Can I call you back?
I just need to borrow your blue dress.
We’re going out for my dad’s birthday and I have nothing decent.
translation.ja: パパの誕生日に着たい

translation.en: Ah, sure, no problem.
-Are you okay? You sound a bit odd. -Ah, nope, all good.
translation.ja: 何かあったの？ 大丈夫服は ここのはずだけど

translation.en: I swear I hung it up.
translation.ja: 大丈夫服は ここのはずだけど

translation.en: Ha! I’ve seen your room. You never hang anything up.
translation.ja: 絶対しまわないくせに

translation.en: Uh, that’s not true. I just take a while to put things away.
translation.ja: 片づけに時間がかかるだけよ

translation.en: I’ll call you back.
What?
[Lily] Pretty dress.
You again!
What’s going on? And who are you?
translation.ja: 何なのよ　あなたは誰？

translation.en: Ever heard of the Tooth Fairy?
Uh, yeah, along with Santa Claus and the Easter Bunny.
But they’re not…
Uh, I mean, in movies, sure, but you’re kidding, right?
translation.ja: 映画の中だけよ 冗談だよね？

translation.en: [chuckles] This is a joke?
I’m Lily and I’m a fairy. My pointy-eared friend, Imogen, is an elf.
translation.ja: 妖精のリリーよ友達のイモジェンはエルフ

translation.en: I am not your friend.
No need to stare!
Um, so, you’re telling me that magic is real?
translation.ja: 魔法は実在するってこと？

translation.en: That there’s fairies, elves, unicorns…?
translation.ja: 妖精 エルフ  一角獣

translation.en: Unicorns? Get real.
[Lily] I know it’s a lot to take in, Kyra,
but magic beings are all around you keeping you safe.
translation.ja: どこにでもいて人間を守ってる

translation.en: Safe from what?
Magic.
The human world would be in chaos without us.
translation.ja: 世界が混乱しちゃうからね

translation.en: This is insane!
Are you going to do this? Her being able to see us is giving me the creeps.
translation.ja: やれば？見られてるのはキモい

translation.en: Do what? Why are you here?
Last night, in the park, you touched a book of magic.
translation.ja: 昨夜 魔法の本に触れたね

translation.en: [Lily] And it might have affected you just a tiny bit.
translation.ja: その影響が出てるみたい

translation.en: [chuckles] Has anything odd happened?
Not really. Oh, yeah, my fingers glow and I heard a dog talking.
translation.ja: 特にない いや 指が光って犬の言葉も

translation.en: Oh! Animal communication! That’s a fairy talent. My mum can do it.
translation.ja: いや 指が光って犬の言葉も 動物語は妖精の能力よママもできる

translation.en: You must have absorbed the more dominant fairy magic when you got zapped.
translation.ja: 妖精の魔法を吸収したのね

translation.en: Hello! Glowing fingers? That has elf magic written all over it.
translation.ja: 指が光るのはエルフの魔法だ

translation.en: -Now, hurry up and do the thing. -No. What thing?
translation.ja: やりなよ 何なのよ

translation.en: -[Imogen] Come on, Lily. Do it! -Do what?
translation.ja: リリー 早く 何を？

translation.en: Kyra, humans can’t ever know that magic exists.
translation.ja: 人間が魔法の存在を知るとまずい

translation.en: If the secret got out, it would upset the balance.
This won’t hurt a bit.
At least I think it won’t, if everything goes right.
Now, hang on a sec…
Did it work?
I think it did.
-[gasping] -What was that?
Fairy dust. [sighs] It’s supposed to make you forget us.
translation.ja: 妖精の粉記憶を消すはずなのに

translation.en: Must be past its use-by date. [chuckles]
Whatever.
Try again.
Oh, no you don’t.
Kyra, be careful.
What is this?
-Don’t! -[squeals]
What?
Hello? [echoes]
Anyone? [echoes]
Hello, anyone!
